name: Flappy Cat- Mega Jump to Escape
name_original: Flappy Cat- Mega Jump to Escape
description:
Flappy Cat is a fly adventure game, an addictive game.

The Cat jump from cloud to cloud, catch the fish along the way. Tap on the screen to open cat's parachute and clear longer distances. Beware of the hungry 'Sharky' in the waters!
